vulnerability_findings.name: uninitialized-local
vulnerability_findings.message: lastMsg in Log.addMessage (patch_8.sol#46) is a local variable never initialiazed

vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-benign
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in ETH_FUND.deposit (patch_8.sol#17-22):
	External calls:
	- TransferLog.addMessage(msg.sender,msg.value,Deposit) (patch_8.sol#20)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- lastBlock (patch_8.sol#21)

external-function

solc-version

Detected issues with version pragma in patch_8.sol:
